name: 丁秀儀
objective: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with frequently used statistical methods and theories. Students will be able to draw appropriate conclusions through problem identification, data collection, and appropriate statistical analysis methods. The course includes: descriptive statistics, probability concepts, probability distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis test, variance analysis, and regression analysis.
